page.title: 14A Day in the Life of William
page.content: School meals are not cooked at our school but come from the High School at Cheadle.We have a cafeteria stlye meal which means we have a choice of two meals. After lunch we go into the playground and play football and sometimes we ride our bikes. During the afternoon we either make something in craft or do art work based on the topic work we are doing. For the Domesday Project we made a 3D large map of village in card and plaster of paris.After another break we would continue with topic work or do P.E. We go home at 3:45pm. On a Monday I go to Cubs at Wetley Rocks, another village down the road. On other days I watch childrens T.V. or take 'Tuffty' my neighbours dog for a walk. I have my super, feed my hamster, watch T.V. until 9:00pm when I get undressed, clean my teeth,wash and go to bed.
